original_text: This land included all the Jordan Valley on the east side of the river, as far south as the Salt Sea, near Mount Pisgah.
korean_text: 요단 이쪽 곧 그 동쪽 온 아라바니 비스가 기슭 아래 아라바의 바다까지이니라

sentences.original_text: This land included all the Jordan Valley
sentences.korean_translation: 이 땅은 모든 요르단 골짜기를 포함했다

sentences.original_text: on the east side of the river
as far south as the Salt Sea
